author: struberg
msg: OWB-672 a decorator is implicitely @Dependent scoped
thus we must need the ownerCreationalContext and not
create a new one. If the Decorator would have @Dependent
InjectionPoints, we would have lost this information...

author: struberg

This is just needed because we wrongly inject the decorated instance
via proxy and not directly atm.
